meanings.definition: The process of becoming hardened by the deposit of calcium salts.
meanings.sent1: The calcification of the bone made it stronger.
meanings.sent2: Dental calcification is essential for healthy teeth.
meanings.sent3: The calcification of the marshmallow turned it into a rock.
meanings.sent4: The calcification of her heart made her emotions rigid.
meanings.sent5: The slow calcification of the coral reef was a marvel to witness.

meanings.definition: The act or process of calcifying.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained the calcification of the tissue.
meanings.sent2: The calcification of the shell protected the snail.
meanings.sent3: The calcification of the pudding made it inedible.
meanings.sent4: The calcification of the idea in his mind was evident.
meanings.sent5: The sudden calcification of the water in the pipe caused a blockage.
